formalpara.title: Figure 12. Ascaroside side-chain biosynthesis. (a) Proposed biosynthetic roles of peroxisomal β-oxidation enzymes ACOX-1, MAOC-1, DHS-28, and DAF-22. (b) (ω-1)-oxygenated ascarosides in wild-type and three β-oxidation mutants (acox-1, maoc-1, and dhs-28) with saturated (blue), α,β-unsaturated (red), and β-hydroxylated (green) side chains. Adapted with permission from (von Reuss et al., 2012). Copyright 2012 American Chemical Society.
